Date: 2025-03-18 11:14
Subject: VOP Focus Groups, MUSE offer, DRIVE's new look, Welcoming David Smith, Rayna Tours Offers
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Join Our Voice of the People Focus Group 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=499&user=10620> 	

Your voice matters! Following the Voice of the People survey, we are hosting a focus group to better understand the key focus areas and the collective challenges shaping them. 

This is your opportunity to share your experiences anonymously in a virtual session using TeamRetro, a platform that allows open and structured discussions.  

Your insights will help us take meaningful actions that drive positive change across the Group. 

When? 25 March 2025 | 11:30 am - 12:30 pm (Dubai time).

Sign up here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=499&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-5-min.png> 	

A Member-Exclusive Offer from MUSE

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-5-min.png> 	

A Member-Exclusive Offer from MUSE

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/d37201463f7db9b0e0d4ea105dea364881649070.png> 	

Your next shopping spree just got even more rewarding - Unlock DOUBLE Points at your next MUSE brand, and TRIPLE Points at the brand after that! Offer is valid until March 30, exclusively for existing MUSE members who have yet to shop in 2025.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-2-min.png> 	

DRIVE Gets a Fresh Look, Making Your Work Easier!

Introducing the new and improved DRIVE homepage, designed to give you a smoother, efficient, and a personal experience!

What’s New?

*	Fresh New Themes 
*	Simplified Navigation
*	Quick Links at the Top 
*	Your Tasks & Pending Actions
*	Shortcuts Under ‘Actions’ 

Log in now and explore the new DRIVE!  <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=500&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=500&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-1-min.png> 	
Welcoming David Smith 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=501&user=10620> 	
David Smith joins our Group as VP of Technology Solutions, Corporate reporting directly to Kamran Abassi.

<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=500&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-1-min.png> 	
Welcoming David Smith 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=501&user=10620> 	
David Smith joins our Group as VP of Technology Solutions, Corporate reporting directly to Kamran Abassi. 

In his new role, David will lead Technology Operations, Service and Change Initiatives across key Corporate functions, including Finance, ensuring solutions align with business goals whilst shaping and executing long-term technology roadmaps to support the company’s growth.
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-7-min.png> 	

Celebrate Ramadan with Rayna Tourism

Make this Ramadan and Eid extra special with up to 50% off on top UAE attractions, thrilling activities, luxurious staycations, exciting events & concerts, seacation getaways, global holiday packages, and visa services! Offer is valid till 6th April, 2025
Click here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=502&user=10620>   and use the promo code: CHALHOUB
OR
Call / WhatsApp - + 97142087511
Email – boxoffice@raynatours.com

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=503&user=10620> 	
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=504&user=10620>
